title: Nathalie Brooke, formidable survivor of Imperial Russia who co-founded the Venice in Peril fund and ran a leading Conservative think tank – obituary
text:
Nathalie Brooke, who has died aged 96, was a last link to the world of Imperial Russia, from which she had been spirited away as an infant to escape the Communist purge of the former nobility.

She dedicated much of the remainder of her long life to the interests and values important to her family. Amongst these were: music, her mother having been a celebrated harpist; art, which led her to become a founder of the Venice in Peril fund; politics, notably the Conservative think tank, the Centre for Policy Studies; and friendship.

Everything that she undertook was entered into with a vitality and vigour that remained formidable into old age. “In Russia, we don’t do the menopause,” she informed a...
description: Nathalie Brooke, who has died aged 96, was a last link to the world of Imperial Russia, from which she had been spirited away as an infant to escape the Communist purge of the former nobility.
